title: Teacakes
ingredients: ['225g (8 oz) strong white bread flour', '225g (8 oz) strong wholemeal bread flour', '1 tsp salt', '55g (2 oz) unsalted butter, diced', '1 sachet easy-blend dried yeast, about 7g', '30g (1 oz) caster sugar', '85g (3 oz) sultanas', '85g (3 oz) currants', '1/2 tsp ground cinnamon', '300 ml (10 fl oz) tepid semi-skimmed milk, or as needed']
